data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Phôngsali to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phôngsali, Laos
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Phôngsali, Laos need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 5,081 believers in the state of Phôngsali the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Phôngsali, Laos to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Tchaho people.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Phôngsali to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, help the 5,081 believers in Phôngsali to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary:
the state of Phôngsali, Laos has a population of 199,900.

We estimate Phôngsali has 5,081 people who might know Jesus, 2,463 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 192,356 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Phôngsali, Laos find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Phôngsali
location.people_groups_list: Kiorr, Nguan, Poumong, Burmese, Tai Khang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kiorr (4,800), Nguan (20,000), Poumong (1,500), Burmese (600), Tai Khang (26,000)
